title: swogerino
author: swogerino
content: I should have received a mining payment from two days ago and I know sometimes 2miners delays the payment but it has been two days,now today afternoon at 1 PM I will receive another payment but yet the first one is unprocessed so far,what can be the problem,maybe the massive Bitcoin price crash but that should not affect fundamentally the pool.

comments.author: YellowSwap
comments.body: I use this pool weeks ago but not recently, they can avoid paying more satoshis or Nano when BTC dumped, that may be the case but dont worry they will pay, you can reach them on their telegram channel, it should be available on the pool website.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on May 13, 2022, 06:09:20 AMI use this pool weeks ago but not recently, they can avoid paying more satoshis or Nano when BTC dumped, that may be the case but dont worry they will pay, you can reach them on their telegram channel, it should be available on the pool website.I am not worried as I still continue to mine there and of course they will pay because they get huge fees from the many miners mining there so it would be stupid if they decide to do nasty things.I hope I can receive these 2 payments today as I am already 100% on the other payment as you can see from the picture,just wanted to see some other ideas of what is happening as the delay is near 48 hour now,not a common thing here.

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on May 13, 2022, 06:58:38 AMQuote from: YellowSwap on May 13, 2022, 06:09:20 AMI use this pool weeks ago but not recently, they can avoid paying more satoshis or Nano when BTC dumped, that may be the case but dont worry they will pay, you can reach them on their telegram channel, it should be available on the pool website.I am not worried as I still continue to mine there and of course they will pay because they get huge fees from the many miners mining there so it would be stupid if they decide to do nasty things.I hope I can receive these 2 payments today as I am already 100% on the other payment as you can see from the picture,just wanted to see some other ideas of what is happening as the delay is near 48 hour now,not a common thing here.pinned message in the telegram group - the mempool is overloaded - payments delayed

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: sxemini on May 13, 2022, 11:48:26 AMQuote from: swogerino on May 13, 2022, 06:58:38 AMQuote from: YellowSwap on May 13, 2022, 06:09:20 AMI use this pool weeks ago but not recently, they can avoid paying more satoshis or Nano when BTC dumped, that may be the case but dont worry they will pay, you can reach them on their telegram channel, it should be available on the pool website.I am not worried as I still continue to mine there and of course they will pay because they get huge fees from the many miners mining there so it would be stupid if they decide to do nasty things.I hope I can receive these 2 payments today as I am already 100% on the other payment as you can see from the picture,just wanted to see some other ideas of what is happening as the delay is near 48 hour now,not a common thing here.pinned message in the telegram group - the mempool is overloaded - payments delayedYes they paid today at 1:30 Pm European time meanwhile I wait for the other payment,hopefully the mempool will be not that overloaded as the fees was high this time from 0.08 USD to some near 0.40 USD (of course if you can call these fees highÂ   ).I should join their telegram then,I haven't joined because they pay like Swiss clock every time,on time.
